scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:bob[call_number]@[remote_ip]:5090 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: alice[call_number] <sip:alice[call_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: bob[call_number] <sip:bob[call_number]@[remote_ip]:5090> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

ACK sip:bob[call_number]@[remote_ip]:5090 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: alice[call_number] <sip:alice[call_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: bob[call_number] <sip:bob[call_number]@[remote_ip]:5090>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Max-Forwards: 70 [routes] Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:bob[call_number]@[remote_ip]:5090 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: alice[call_number] <sip:alice[call_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: bob[call_number] <sip:bob[call_number]@[remote_ip]:5090>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Max-Forwards: 70 [routes] Content-Length: 0
